Author: pg
Content: We'd always offer money.  I suppose a startup could \nrefuse to take it.  But that would probably mean \nwe'd picked wrong.

Author: emmett
Content: He means they fund every qualified startup that applies; they have plenty of money. If 100 promising startup teams applied, they'd fund all 100 of them.

Author: brianmckenzie
Content: Just sent myself a future-mail telling myself to go to the driving range this weekend. I hope it works, because I'm totally gonna forget otherwise.

Author: ericb
Content: I wish they raised the fees more. Domain squatting wouldn't be so rampant if it costs $40 to register a domain like it used to.

Author: tx
Content: I guarantee you that SAP is guilty as charged, they all are. When I did enterprise software, salespeople kept getting everybody in trouble by selling products that had never existed, in this business such practices are the norm, in fact in many enterprise software companies engineers are advised against speaking to "sales team"

Title: What Does Hadoop Mean to You?

Author: Mistone
Content: this was one of the coolest stories I've read in a long time, very fun and nicely done.

Author: wanorris
Content: I certainly don't want to defend SAP, but when enterprise software sucks, how much is the fault of the software and how much is simply the enterprise? If you started out with good software, could it survive an enterprise deployment -- and all the byzantine requirements and oversight -- intact?

Author: nazgulnarsil
Content: "send a message back if you can"

Author: aaroneous
Title: Breakdown of referring traffic my startup received from the blogosphere

Author: astrec
Content: In my case I have money from a previous successful startup, will be moving to the US, and put a premium on local knowledge and the right introductions - for me and others in the same position there is little value in taking small amounts of cash, but the value of everything else YC offers could be quite significant. Surrendering a percentage of your company for a higher value return is quite reasonable.

Author: sudeepjuvekar
Title: My achievement!
Content: No big deal...But still, winning something from a Turing Awardee  makes you feel high :)

Author: justindz
Content:
So, in a nutshell, you trust ClickPass security less than you trust your email provider's security. And, the margin is great enough to overcome whatever ease-of-use gains you might get from ClickPass over email.

Did I get that right?
